title: 'Nice quality'
body: 'Good cutting tool. I highly recommend this product to everyone'

title: 'Pathetic Product'
body: 'Very Bad product. Must NOT buy. No sharpness at all.'

title: 'Awesome knife from Glare'
body: 'Those looking for sharpener knives - Glare would be the best choice. Must have kitchen knives!!!'

title: 'Not sharp'
body: 'It was not sharp like a new knife have to be. Once upon a time i was using tgis brand bur sadly they dont check their product quality anymore it seems.'

title: 'Using this same brand since 2007'
body: 'I am very glad about this. Actually
column5: I am using this same brand since 2007'

title: It's glare folks
body: 'As expected big and sharp enough for daily use in the kitchen...'

title: 'Not worth'
body: 'The product is good but what surprise me is the sharpness of this item is not upto the mark . I am already using same brand item but this time the product unfortunately not upto the expectations.'

title: 'Ok product'
body: 'Does the job. Only issue is metal part is very thin and it bends while cutting. Resharpening is also possible very few times due to thin metal'

title: 'Good quality Knife blade'
body: Always proves it's excellent quality. Long lasting sharpness
